projects.title: Embedded Systems
projects.description: I am currently working as an embedded software developer at Bilko, using STM32 and Nuvoton microcontrollers.

credits.Video Editor:
I made this program for a company that provides live streaming services when I was freelancing. With this program, you can quickly cut the video, merge the videos from the marked places and add transition videos between them, etc.
I made the program to work crossplatform using PyQT5 and ffmpeg. I made the timeline and markers that appear in the gif from scratch using QPainter and QPen.
